name: jewar-house-full-stack
description: Full stack Jewar House application with backend and frontend

scripts.dev: npm run dev:server & npm run dev:client
scripts.dev:server: cd server && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:client: cd client && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install

author: Jewar House
